Class.name: Report.INREC
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INREC.Company as INREC_Company,SQLUser.INRECLine.Company as INRECLine_Company,SQLUser.INREC.ReceiptNumber,SQLUser.INREC.Type,SQLUser.INREC.Status,SQLUser.INREC.ProcessedBy,SQLUser.INREC.ProcessedDate,SQLUser.INRECLine.ReceiptNumber as ReceiptNumberLine,SQLUser.INRECLine.LineNumber,SQLUser.INRECLine.Order1,SQLUser.INRECLine.OrderLine,SQLUser.INRECLine.Quantity,SQLUser.INRECLine.Unit,SQLUser.INRECLine.OrderQuantity as BaseQuantity,SQLUser.INRECLine.Item,SQLUser.INRECLine.Each,SQLUser.INRECLine.Total,SQLUser.INRECLine.Location,SQLUser.INRECLine.StockLocation,SQLUser.INRECLine.TransferOrderNumber,SQLUser.INRECLine.ItemDescription,SQLUser.INREC.Location as ReceiptLocation,SQLUser.WWW0121.Company,SQLUser.WWW0121.Location as LocationID,SQLUser.WWW0121.LocationName as LocationNameHeader from SQLUser.INREC,SQLUser.INRECLine,SQLUser.WWW0121 where (INREC.ReceiptNumber = INRECLine.ReceiptNumber) and (INREC.Location = WWW0121.Location)
